TopicTitle: Crash when reverting to space-plane hanger.

Articles.Content:
Windows 8.1

Steam

KSP Version 0.90.0.705

When reverting to the space-plane hangar I've had the game crash on me twice now. The first time I was reverting before my flight had started as I hadn't set action groups. The second time it was as my craft was exploding from a failed attempt at takeoff. There are folders for each crash and I'd love to give them to.. you know, whoever I'm supposed to.

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/g432rm6ae21wzx3/AADdNA2KfvAbboeMS4mzZPexa?dl=0

There are the two crashes and the blueprints for the plane I just had it crash with.
